urlText: Trains run to a changed timetable and stopping pattern. You may need to change trains to continue your journey.
content:
Saturday 22 and Sunday 23 July
  • Trains run to a changed timetable and stopping pattern. You may need to change trains to continue your journey.
  • Trains that normally start and end at Revesby will instead run between Leppington and the City via the Airport, to a changed timetable.

  • Saturday from 8.40am to 3pm, buses replace the all-stations trains between Wolli Creek and Revesby.
  • Trains continue to run but will not stop at stations between Padstow and Turrella.

  • Sunday from 9am to 3pm, trains run to a changed timetable and stopping pattern. You may need to change trains to continue your journey.

  • Replacement buses may be impacted by driver shortages. We are doing all we can to minimise the impact to your journey and provide a safe service, however cancellations or delays may occur.
  • Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date real time information. You can also subscribe to planned trackwork alerts.
Bus route
26T8 Wolli Creek, then all stations to East Hills and return

  • Nightly from 9.10pm to 3am, buses replace trains from Penrith to Lithgow.
  • The last train to the Blue Mountains leaves Central at 19:18, arriving Mount Victoria at 21:36.
  • Trains run between Penrith and Central, some to a changed timetable.

  • Replacement buses may be impacted by driver shortages. We are doing all we can to minimise the impact to your journey and provide a safe service, however cancellations or delays may occur.

urlText: Trackwork may affect how you travel. Buses replace some trains
content:
Saturday 29 and Sunday 30 July
  • Buses replace trains between Sydenham and Central, and between Central and Bondi Junction.
  • Trains run to a changed timetable between Cronulla and Sydenham, and between Waterfall and Hurstville only.
  • If you are travelling between T4 Illawarra Line stations and the City change trains at Wolli Creek to continue your journey, in both directions. Extra T8 Airport Line trains run between Wolli Creek and the City Circle.
  • Change at Town Hall for express buses towards Bondi Junction.

  • Trackwork buses do not leave from Martin Place Station. Local buses leave from nearby bus stops or you can catch the light rail to Town Hall or Central.

  • Sunday from 4am to 10am, buses also replace trains between Waterfall and Sutherland, and between Hurstville and Central. Some buses start or end at Redfern.
  • Trains run between Cronulla and Hurstville only, to a changed timetable.

  • Replacement buses may be impacted by driver shortages. We are doing all we can to minimise the impact to your journey and provide a safe service, however cancellations or delays may occur.
  • Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date real time information. You can also subscribe to planned trackwork alerts.
Bus routes
1T3 Sydenham, then all stations to Central and return
2T3 Sydenham, then Central and return
20T4 Bondi Junction, then Edgecliff, Kings Cross, Central and return (bypassing Martin Place)
23T4 Bondi Junction, then Town Hall and return
25T4 Edgecliff, then Kings Cross, Town Hall and return
324 City, Walsh Bay to Watsons Bay via Old South Head Rd
- Town Hall (Park St), Kings Cross, Edgecliff and return
 
Sunday morning only
2T4 Waterfall, then all stations to Sutherland then express to Central and return
3AT4 Hurstville, then express to Central and return
7AT4 Hurstville, then all stations to Sydenham, then Redfern and return

urlText: Devon Rd, Bardwell Park, temporary bus stop closure
content:
From 7am Friday 7 July to 9pm Friday 21 July 2023:
  • Bus stop Charles Daly Reserve, Devon Rd (2207205) will close for M6 Stage 1 construction work. The alternative stop for the 491 towards Hurstville will be bus stop Bardwell Rd before Churchill St (2207206).
  • Bus stop Devon Rd opp Charles Daly Reserve (2207203) will close for M6 Stage 1 construction work. An alternative bus stop for the 491 towards Five Dock will be available on Devon Rd before Earlwood Cres.
subtitle: Devon Rd, Bardwell Park, temporary bus stop closure
